meanings.definition: A type of rhythmic pattern in music characterized by a swinging or syncopated feel.
meanings.sent1: The band played lively swingbeats that made everyone dance.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to jazz with its catchy swingbeats.
meanings.sent3: The swingbeats in the song were so infectious, they got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: Her voice flowed with the smoothness of swingbeats, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The swingbeats added a playful bounce to the music, making it irresistible to tap your feet.

meanings.definition: The act of moving back and forth in a smooth, curving motion.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed the feeling of freedom as they soared on the swingbeats.
meanings.sent2: The swingbeats of the pendulum were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The swingbeats of the boat on the gentle waves made me feel relaxed.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had the grace of a swan, moving with elegant swingbeats.
meanings.sent5: The swingbeats of the branches in the wind created a soothing rhythm in the forest.
